name: Vacation Island - The Relaxation Simulator
description:
Overview:

Vacation Island is a small game where you are on a tropical island, with relaxing tunes and nice scenery to help you chill out. Explore the island, take a walk on the beach, or take a seat in your vacation hut. It is up to you. This was a game I made in a few days just to have a break from the main game project I was working on. It's not very big or polished, and there isn't much to do as far as game-play goes other than exploring. It is just a labor of love meant to help people relax. I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

WASD to move, and move your mouse to adjust camera angle. The beaches on this island are pretty steep sometimes, so try walking in a zig-zag to get back up to the island from the beach.
